name: Pet Webcam Widget
author: Coop Cam

sections.description:
Inspired by the Coop Cam project, this plugin will display a live webcam stream widget on your WordPress sidebar.

Prior setup is required, however we have made the process as simple as possible.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload pet-webcam-widget.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Head to the ‘Appearances’ then ‘Widgets’ and drag the ‘Pet Webcam Widget’ to an available spot on your sidebar
  4. Enter a title (optional, eg. My Pet Webcam), the stream url (required, eg. http://stream.coopcam.co.uk/quail.mjpg) and a message to display (optional, eg. Check out my pet webcam!)
  5. Visit your home page and admire your live stream!

short_description: Inspired by the Coop Cam project, this plugin will display a live webcam stream widget on your WordPress sidebar.
